Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Given its worth to you, I am offering this product to you for $14,000. This price reflects not only its market value but also the opportunity to secure such an asset at a premium. I trust that you will find its features and benefits to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
